name: Galaxy (Emad Farjami)
description:
There are two games in this file.

1.GalexyAsteroids:

Description:

Simulating gravity of planets in space. Use a gun to shot asteroids to the space

Keys:

Turn Left: Left Arrow     Turn Right: RigthArrow       Increase Power: Up Arrow       

Decrease Power: Down Arrow    Shoot: Space 

---------------------------------------------------------

2.GalexyShooter:

Description:

Simulating gravity of planets in space. Move and shot asteroids to the space in a First Person Shooter style
